entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
